channel.title: New Game doesnt start
channel.description:
Hey,
First of all, sorry for my bad english.
i just purchased and installed Black Mesa from Steam. But if i hit the new game button and choose Chapter 1, the game doesnt start. It only close the chapter-window and im back in the start menu.
There are no error messages.
What can i do?
Thank you.
cLimaX

item.title: New Game doesnt start
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
OS? Latest GPU drivers installed? Tried to verify game cache?

Read full topic
